articles.title: Russia-Ukraine crisis: Former RBI Governor Rajan says impact may not be limited to oil & gas - Economic Times
articles.description: Amid rising tensions over the ongoing invasion of Ukraine by Russia, former Reserve Bank of India (RBI) governor Raghuram Rajan has said that not just oil & natural gas, but various other essential commodities like wheat may face the brunt.
